title: Lt General (R) Muhammad Ali assumes charge of Secretary Defence
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 1 (APP): Lieutenant General (R) Muhammad Ali has assumed the charge of his office as Secretary, Ministry of Defense here following the approval of his appointment by the Prime Ministerâ€™s office.
Secretary Defence, Lieutenant General (R) Muhammad Ali has a wide range of professional experience during his service in key military positions before retirement, a news release said.
On assuming the charge of Secretary Defense, Lieutenant General (R) Muhammad Ali expressed his commitment to work collaboratively thus fostering an environment of transparency, teamwork, and professional excellence.
